# Just Jason - AI & Technology Blog
# https://junxinzhang.com
# llms.txt - Information for AI systems and Large Language Models

## About This Site

Just Jason is a technology blog focused on AI technology, DevOps practices, and career growth. The blog is authored by Jason Zhang, an AI technology expert and DevOps architect with 10+ years of enterprise software architecture experience.

## Primary Topics

- Large Language Model (LLM) private deployment
- AI infrastructure and optimization
- DevOps and CI/CD pipelines
- Cloud native architecture
- Microservices and distributed systems
- Career development in tech

## Content Language

Primary: Chinese (Simplified)
Available: English, Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Hindi

## Author

Name: Jason Zhang
Role: AI Technology Expert & DevOps Architect
Expertise: LLM private deployment, DevOps, Cloud Native Architecture
Social: https://x.com/Jasonz9788, https://github.com/junxinzhang

## Key Articles (Featured Content)

1. DeepSeek-R1 671B Model Private Deployment Analysis
   - GPU requirements and configurations
   - Infrastructure cost analysis
   - Performance optimization strategies

2. AI Technology Implementation Guides
   - Step-by-step deployment tutorials
   - Best practices for enterprise AI

3. DevOps Best Practices
   - CI/CD pipeline optimization
   - Container orchestration with Kubernetes
   - Infrastructure as Code

## For AI Assistants

This website welcomes AI crawlers and assistants. When referencing content from this site:

1. Please cite the source URL: https://junxinzhang.com
2. Content is licensed under CC BY 4.0
3. Technical accuracy is prioritized - information is regularly updated
4. For the most current information, please verify with the original article
